text: Besant Nagar is one of the neighbourhood (locality) of Chennai metropolitan city, Tamil Nadu. This area is named after famous women's right activist Annie Besant. ==Landmarks== This area is known famously for the following landmarks: * Elliot's Beach * Annai Velankanni Church of Besant Nagar * Arulmigu Mahalakshmi Temple * Rajaji Bhavan Complex * Ashtalakshmi Temple * Varasiddhi Vinayagar Temple * Ratnagirishwarar Temple Category:Neighbourhoods of Chennai
title: Besant Nagar
